attributes.additional_details: Also, apparently, since the EU's formation wars have seemingly stopped across the continent - who knew?
attributes.background: This EU thing seems like a good idea. A union of countries with like-minded interests coming together to support each other economically, culturally and socially. What's not to like? Plus, I hear it'll make travelling to Europe a lot easier and cheaper. So, I say, let's join on 1st April 2019!
